data.title: Vishnu Chakra - 2 Inches | Antique Brass Statue/ Vishnu Chakram for Pooja/ 80 Gms Approx
data.meta_description: Bring divinity into your home with our Vishnu chakra. This Lord Vishnu chakra radiates spirituality and elegance. Buy this Brass vishnu chakram now and invite blessings.
data.text:
• Embrace divine energy and add a touch of sacred symbolism to your space with the Antique Finish Brass Vishnu Chakra with Base.

• This meticulously crafted brass ornament features the iconic discus (chakra) associated with Lord Vishnu, the preserver in Hinduism.

• The Vishnu Chakra is made from high-quality brass, ensuring durability and a beautiful antique finish.

• The Lord Vishnu chakra is intricately designed with detailed engravings and patterns, showcasing the craftsmanship and artistry of the piece.

• The Lord Vishnu chakra is a symbolic representation of Lord Vishnu's divine weapon, emphasizing protection, righteousness, and cosmic order.

• The Vishnu chakram comes with a stable base, allowing you to display it securely on your puja altar, mantelpiece, or any sacred space.

• The antique finish adds a vintage and traditional touch to the brass chakram, making it an aesthetically pleasing and spiritually significant addition to your home.

• Lord Vishnu's chakram is considered a powerful symbol of protection, capable of dispelling negative energies and safeguarding devotees.

• Displaying the Antique Finish Brass Vishnu Chakram with Base in your home is a way to invite the divine presence of Lord Vishnu and seek his blessings.

• As a symbol of protection and cosmic order, this Brass chakra serves as a reminder of the divine forces that guide and safeguard us on our spiritual journey.

• Add a touch of sacred elegance to your space with this beautifully crafted brass ornament.
